name: Oneiro (Empyrean55)
description:
THIS IS A DEMO

You always dreamed of having the perfect digimon team ? Creating a team that no one could defeat ?

With Oneiro, your dream comes true ! Gather strong Digimon by crafting their DNA, train, evolve, customize their abilities and stats at your own will !

You can create a Digimon the way you want it to be ! Fight other tamers, defeat the Trials, train in the Rifts, head into the dungeons and finally, achieve the Crests !

Oneiro is the game where Digimon fans can fulfill all their wishes !

--------

Oneiro is a 1v1 battle game like. Carrying 3 Digimon on your team, getting new ones is more dedicated towards crafting them. 

With a lot of different features like Guild,  quests, crafting profession, there is plenty of things to do all throughout your journey !

--------

The demo contains at this moment : 

• More than 70 Digimon currently available and playable ( hundreds to come )

• More than 100 different abilities to play with and perfect your ideal Digimon

• 4 Guilds to choose, with different shop and different quests tied to each one of them

• 2 different profession that will dictate how your journey will go, each specializing on on a specific  way of progressing

• And a lot more to discover ...

--------

Join the discord and chat with people all around the world for help, find informations and get updated on last changes !

https://discord.gg/B34dvKvV

--------

Digimon, Oneiro and all related characters and monsters are the property of Akyioshi Hondo, Toei Animation and Bandai.
This game is intended for entertainment purposes only.
